div.p: RIDEAU in Fortification, a small elevation of earth, extending itself lengthwise on a plain, serving to cover a camp or give an advantage in a post.

p.hi: RideÎ»u is sometimes also used for a trench, the earth of which is thrown up on its side, to serve as a parapet for covering the men.
